text:
The recent live was really amazing!
I was there in person, and I was pumped the whole time!

I couldn’t take my eyes off of
Serizawa-san’s high-level dance.

Might be truly captivating fan service by Mayuzumi-san,
Izumi-san’s cool and fiery performance......

Fufu......
I’m so happy to be praised like that♡

I think everyone is at a miraculous level.
I’m looking forward to the next live as well......!

Thank you for the compliments......!
The members and I are very happy.
No, no, it’s not nearly enough yet......!

Oh, by the way......since we’re here,
there’s something I wanted to ask!

You all became idols through scouting,
not auditions, right......
What kind of drama was behind that?

Sorry, if I may answer,
each of us had our own chance encounters......

Oh, chance encounters!
That’s also an amazing miracle!!!

As expected of 283-san,
your luck in finding talent is impressive!

Haha, yes......
I was really fortunate to meet everyone.

It’s truly wonderful!
Luck is also necessary in the entertainment world!

Ah, I’m sorry......I got carried away......
Well then, let’s start the interview!
